Title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Prepurchase Capacity Packs for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
Description:
This feature integrates pre-purchased capacity packs into Microsoft 365 admin center for M365 Copilot Chat. Administrators can apply pre-purchased message capacity to Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat before incurring pay-as-you-go charges.
GA date: August CY2025
